Definition at line 31 of file chtmlbookdisplay.h.

Member Function Documentation

char CHTMLBookDisplay::Display (  CSwordModuleInfo *    module )  [virtual]
 

Renders the current entry of the module using HTML tags.

The rendered text is cached so it's faster if it's called for the same key next time.

Reimplemented from CHTMLEntryDisplay.
